metadata.title: CVE-2014-9218 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
libraries/common.inc.php in phpMyAdmin 4.0.x before 4.0.10.7, 4.1.x before4.1.14.8, and 4.2.x before 4.2.13.1 allows remote attackers to cause adenial of service (resource consumption) via a long password.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-9218` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

phpmyadmin - 4:4.2.12-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: phpmyadmin package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4:4.2.12-2').
